I had a peaceful few days at LimdimHere's place in Hue. Very interestingly designed space, with a comfy bed(s) and large kitchen. The location is down at the very end of a tiny alleyway, making for a secluded, but not exactly private, setting.

Unfortunately, because of the layout and close proximity to the nearby buildings, the natural lighting is quite minimal. But all in all I still enjoyed the layout, the chilled out environment, and my overall time here.
As a solo traveler, the price is a bit high for what is provided. Yet, if you and a couple of friends decide to stay for a few days, then the price would make more sense.

I had a great stay at the Monkey House with my family. Place was clean and the same as the images. Check-in was easy and the host checked in often to ask about us.
Host is very responsive and helpful. The place is very close to Hue landmarks! I rented a motorbike thanks to the host and was surprised to find out how close everything was. There‚Äôs also a mall nearby that the host recommended that I went to a few times.
Highly recommend this place!

It was a great stay at the monkey house as we were able to feel right at home. Came with my friends so we could each have separate bedrooms and cook something in the kitchen as everything was available for us
The perfect place. Everything is clean. Neighbor quiet. The host very nice and support us even the late night. Highly recommend
Super friendly, very Nice house and very helpful !

Wir waren mit unseren beiden kleinen Kindern f√ºr 6 N√§chte im Monkey House.
Der Gastgeber ist ein Superhost. Er hat uns viele tolle Tipps gegeben, war jederzeit erreichbar, hat f√ºr uns einen Roller organisiert und sogar Spielzeug f√ºr unsere Kinder bereitgelegt.
Das Haus ist super gelegen, man kann zu Fu√ü viele Restaurants, einen lokalen Markt und Superm√§rkte erreichen. Hue ist toll.
Abends ist es bis ca 22:30 Uhr etwas laut mit Musik, der Rest der Nacht ist aber ruhig.
Leider hatten wir an den 3 letzten Tagen Pech, da gestartet wurde das Haus nebenan zu renovieren. Wir wurden jeden Morgen um 7 Uhr mit Baul√§rm geweckt. Daf√ºr kann aber der Host nat√ºrlich nichts.
Das Haus hat 3 Stockwerke, das ausgeschriebene Kinderzimmer mit Schaukel befindet sich ganz oben. Dieses Zimmer hat unsere Erwartungen leider nicht getroffen, da es weder Licht noch Klimaanlage gab und sich unser Kids im eher kargen Raum nicht wohl gef√ºhlt haben.
Der Rest des Hause hat uns gut gefallen.
Nice home
Very nice and affordable
Excellent location, quiet road, private, huge space for family, loved my stay. Would recommend to stay here!
We loved our stay at the monkey house. The host went beyond expectations to help us in any way.
Everything was great!
good
A spacious and comfortable place to stay with very helpful hosts.

The Monkey House is spotlessly clean. It is spacious and stylist. The host was quick to respond to our queries and immediately fixed any issues or difficulties we had. Checking in was super easy and it is centrally located. You could walk to the main attraction or a short taxi ride.
Strongly recommend Monkey House, you'll be pleasantly surprised .

Our stay here was extremely comfortable and homely! To begin with, check in was very simple and clear thanks to the precise instructions provided by the host. The space itself was extremely clean and organised, and had all the listed amenities. The host was very responsive and friendly. The location was also perfect, since it was private and peacefully tucked away in an alley, but also walkable from the livelier parts of town. Check out was also straightforward, and hassle free. We had a very pleasant stay, and would be happy to stay here again in the future!

Absolutely beautiful apartment. We stayed here one night and we wished we stayed for longer! We've been travelling for nearly 5 months and this is by far one of the nicest airbnb's we've stayed at, the apartment is so modern and the interior is amazing. Would recommend to anyone wanting to stay in Hue. Great location as well. 10/10 would stay again!

This apartment was awesome and seems a no-brainer to stay here while in Hue.  It has everything you need - central location, newly renovated interior, squeaky clean, big table/work area, comfy bed, TONS of natural light, good wifi, and friendly helpful hosts.   I wish I could pack it up and take it with me for the rest of my travels, unpacking it at each new location, like a Central Asian nomad packing/unpacking his yurt in centuries gone by.

This was one of our favorite Airbnbs that we have ever stayed at - it was so beautiful, comfortable, clean, and in such a great location. We were able to walk to several different areas that we wanted to explore, and we felt extremely comfortable in the space. We greatly appreciated the hosts, especially when my husband believed he left his wedding ring in the home after we checked out and they went above and beyond to try to help us. We highly recommend staying here!

The apartment is clean and lovely, with all the listed amenities. It‚Äôs in a convenient and quiet location, and we were able to rent a moped from across the street. I‚Äôd recommend Trang‚Äôs place to anyone visiting Hue city :)
The Apartment is located central, beautifully looking and very modern. It does lack some space to put things in the bathroom, just something to keep in mind. Can recommend to stay here.

15 minutes of walking or less to the imperial city (forbidden city) of Hue. The host is caring and courteous she helps me rent a scooter with a good price and recommends me worth trying cafes and restaurants, the local ones. Definitely stay again

The stay at Limdim House was okay, but I wouldn‚Äôt stay there once more.
The room looked more spacious on the pictures - but this wasn‚Äôt the problem. It was more that the bathroom was part of the room, so that the room itself was very humid. Opening the balcony door couldn‚Äôt help either, because it was shadowy all day long.
Furthermore we didn‚Äôt quite feel as real guests - the host only showed us around once, then we never saw him again. There was no warm welcome, only a lot of rules to follow around the place. Every other question we had was answered with a reference to a PDF document he sent us upfront.

Thank you anyway for letting us stay :)

First the positives:
1. Interesting design of the place and cool vibe
2. Nice kitchen and washing facility
3. Easy going host who didn‚Äôt mind our delayed train schedule
4. Reasonable price
Negatives:
1. The house is in a very residential cul-de-sec with very very early neighbors who wake you up with their biz. Even the host family members are very early risers and you can hear them very well.
And one of them rears roosters that do their rooster thing at 3am and 6/7am.
It‚Äôs also not near anything particularly (no mini marts, cafes, etc) though a brisk 15 walks will get you to the walking street.
2. Perhaps the host is not used to international guests and not sure how to receive foreign guests. He didn‚Äôt bother to explain the area or attractions around his house beyond one restaurant recommendation.
His wifi password is also not shown anywhere and had to be prompted to reveal.
When asked how the washing machine works, he pointed to the instruction sheet and said you can read that.
The problem is it‚Äôs all in Vietnamese which clearly English speakers can‚Äôt understand.
3. While the house design is cool and fun, some parts are not practical and/or doesn‚Äôt work.
The toilet lights are next to the bed (not in the toilet) without any sign that it‚Äôs the toilet lights. Counter intuitive and very very confusing.
The shower faucet fell off at first touch.
AC system leaked for an hour at night when it started.
The key card allows you access in and out of the house through its front gate. But since there is never anybody at check in/checkout counter aka kitchen, I had to open the gate with the key card, put my luggage to stop it from closing, run back to the house to put down key card and then run back down to leave. Doesn‚Äôt make sense.
The room is also very small and hardly enough space for two to walk around the bed with our luggages.
The bed squeaks loudly with any movement which meant waking up whenever your travel companion moves at all.
Overall it looks nice in photos but the photos are kinda catfishy. The host might also wanna rethink his reception and check out procedures.

Stylish and comfortable, a little small and people walk right by the window, so you cannot really open the curtain.

bedrooms upstairs 1 downstairs. 4 bathrooms total. Laundry facilities. Well stocked kitchen. Perfect situation for a group or just one or two travelers or vacationers.

10-15 min tops to any destination in Hu·∫ø you might want to see. Have the best of both worlds, nature and city life. The roof is a giant deck accessible by the outdoor circular stairs, go up and see the view. Explore the area too! It‚Äôs near lots of nature you can ride around in!
